About Us

Cooch Behar College, Cooch Behar College Affiliated to COOCH BEHAR PANCHANAN BARMA UNIVERSITY was established on 16 November 1970 at the head of the town of Cooch Behar with a campus area of ​​3.7hectares, located on the outskirts of Cooch Behar city. The college is housed in two imposing two-storied buildings and a single-storied building with a vast green playground in the middle of the campus.


The department of Computer Science started its journey on the first day of 2008 as a programming course. It started as an honors course in 2016. In addition to its 20 computers, the department has teaching and learning facilities, including its own library. The establishment is surrounded by free Wi-Fi around the whole campus.The department has organized many clubs like -Technical Club, Nature and E-Waste Club, Adventure Club, and Drama Club to increase the creativity in students' minds. Our department also organized some seminars and special classes for students to keep them in shape and keep them motivated. Students get encouragement to participate in research and live projects under the guidance of faculty members.


The department is well-equipped with research programs and has received academic accolades and accolades. The department has taken responsibility for spreading knowledge by judiciously expanding its role in advanced, non-conventional, applied and, work-oriented fields, maintaining the quality of education at global standards at a low cost.

DEPT. OF COMPUTER SCIENCE
